General.Name: Jiajiayue Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiajiayue Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of supermarkets businesses in People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Weihai, the People's Republic of China. Jiajiayue Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiajiayue Holding Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Jiulong City International Building, Weihai, China, 264200
